definition.text: Moving average convergence divergence (MACD) is a trend-following momentum indicator that shows the relationship between two moving averages of a securityâ€™s price.

paragraphs.text: The parameters of the Pluvtech MACD indicator can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Initialization under ’Pluvtech MACD’ Product Definition.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| Pluvtech MACD | PLUVTECH_MACD | macd, signalLine, histogram, reverseMacd, macdEmaCross, macdZeroLine |
reverseMacd: Price action closing above this value will cause an increase of the MACD and Vice Versa.
macdEmaCross: Price action closing above this value will cause the MACD to cross above the EMA signal line and Vice Versa.
macdZeroLine: The predicted closing price value which would make MACD = 0
